channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Expert Witness
channel.desc: When smouldering human remains are found in a field in Hertfordshire, a policeman's hunch and a diligent expert witness help catch the killers. Not every expert witness starts their career expecting to use their specialist knowledge to crack serious crime. The expert witness in this case began her working life recording pollen samples on archeological digs. But she then found herself central to an investigation into a brutal murder committed by a gang of criminals.
